      • makePath

        public static java.lang.String makePath​(java.lang.String... pathElement)
        Construct a OS-independent path from its arguments. Has no effect on the file system, i.e. this is just String manipulation. Ignores empty and null Strings in its arguments.
        Parameters:
        pathElement - a list of path elements (i.e. OS-compatible names)
        Returns:
        the full path name

      • makeFile

        public static java.io.File makeFile​(java.lang.String... pathElements)
        Construct a OS-independent path from its arguments. Has no effect on the file system, i.e. this is just String manipulation. Ignores empty and null Strings in its arguments.
        Parameters:
        pathElements - a list of path elements (i.e. OS-compatible names)
        Returns:
        the File handle to the path
